experience.description: Conducted primary research on optimizing garbage collection algorithms for high-throughput Java applications. Developed a benchmark suite in C++ to measure memory latency across different JVM configurations. Contributed to a peer-reviewed publication on concurrent data structures.

Collaborated with senior researchers to implement a prototype for a distributed file system using Java. Refactored legacy C++ modules to improve thread safety and resource allocation. Validated research hypotheses through rigorous unit testing and performance profiling.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
